verses.name: Job 31:17
verses.text: Or have eaten my morsel myself alone, and the fatherless hath not eaten thereof;

verses.name: Job 31:18
verses.text: (For from my youth he was brought up with me, as with a father, and I have guided her from my mother’s womb;)

verses.name: Job 31:19
verses.text: If I have seen any perish for want of clothing, or any poor without covering;

verses.name: Job 31:20
verses.text: If his loins have not blessed me, and if he were not warmed with the fleece of my sheep;

verses.name: Job 31:21
verses.text: If I have lifted up my hand against the fatherless, when I saw my help in the gate:
